author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Nagercoil Sub-Regional Office of the Employees’ Provident Fund Organisation has disbursed Rs.5 crore towards settlement of 1,735 claims in January, according to a press release issued by P. Senthil Kumar, Regional Provident Fund Commissioner.

Addressing ‘PF Near You’ programme at the Sub-Regional Office here recently, Mr. Senthil Kumar said that the maximum time for settlement had been reduced to 20 days.

About 80.34 per cent claims was settled in 10 days.

A sum of Rs.5.20 crore was received from the establishments as their contribution during January 2016.

Notices had been issued to 855 out of 2,263 establishments for not remitting the subscription collected from the members.

A total amount of Rs. 29.61 lakh had been recovered from defaulting establishments. A total of 62,316 members had activated UAN till January, and KYC details of 1,30,667 members were being uploaded by employers, of these KYC details of 1,03,205 members had been digitally attested by the employers, Mr. Senthil Kumar added.
title: ‘EPFO disbursed Rs.5 cr. during January’
